thread.title: Official visit at Airbus Stand

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Official visit at Airbus Stand
text:
REUTERS LTD ACCEPTS NO EDITORIAL RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE ENTIRE CONTENT OR INFORMATION RELATING TO THESE PICTURES, INCLUDING ALL CLAIMS, NAMES, DATES, SCRIPTS, ADVISORIES AND COPYRIGHTS.
Singapore Airshow 2018
STORY: Official visit by Ng Eng Hen, Singapore Ministry of Defence to the Airbus stand at the Singapore Airshow 2018. Ng Eng He was accompanied by Pierre Jaffre Head of Airbus Asia-Pacific and Patrick de Castelbajac Airbus Executive Vice President Strategy and International.
SHOWS: Official visit at Airbus Stand
From left to right:
Ng Eng Hen, Singapore Ministry of Defence, Pierre Jaffre Head of Airbus Asia-Pacific and Patrick de Castelbajac Airbus Executive Vice President Strategy and International.
CONTENT PROVIDED BY SINGAPORE AIR SHOW, VIA REUTERS. PHOTO BY AIRBUS / P. MASLET / master films
REUTERS LTD ACCEPTS NO EDITORIAL RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE ENTIRE CONTENT OR INFORMATION RELATING TO THESE PICTURES, INCLUDING ALL CLAIMS, NAMES, DATES, SCRIPTS, ADVISORIES AND COPYRIGHTS.
